 2019-03002019-04-08,  IT,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SHERI MEYERHOFFER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister for International Trade, to be styled as the Canadian Ombudsperson for Responsible Enterprise, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective May 1, 2019.
